name: Velodrome Reinvest
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Velodrome Finance](https://app.velodrome.finance/liquidity) and stakes it in the gauge to collect any available tokens and earn VELO rewards. Rewards are harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.
